page.title: 01GAZETTEER
page.content: Sheepy Magna, Sheepy Parva and Sibson are small rural villages on the border of Leicestershire and Warickshire. County-Leicestershire. Local Authority-Hinckley and Bosworth. M.P. Adam Butler(Conservative). {Population(1983)} Sheepy Magna 646 Sheepy Parva 89 Sibson 380 The villages are central to all the major towns of the Midlands and in 1986 will be served by the M42 motorway which will link the M1 and M6.This is predominately a{farming} area but also has a relatively large commuter population.
